ConfigurationOption.Value: select a.assetnum, e.assetattrid, aa.description, aa.domainid, aa.measureunitid, e.alnvalue, e.numvalue, e.displaysequence, e.classstructureid, e.siteid, a.assetuid, e.assetspecid, cs.classspecid, aa.assetattributeid from assetspec e join asset a on a.assetnum = e.assetnum and a.siteid = e.siteid left join classspec cs on e.classstructureid = cs.classstructureid and e.assetattrid = cs.assetattrid left join assetattribute aa on cs.assetattributeid = aa.assetattributeid

List.ListEntry: a.location in (select location from locancestor where ancestor = '${MX_WORK_LOCATION}' and siteid = '${MX_CURRENT_SITE}' ) and a.status in ('ACTIVE', 'OPERATING')
